snippet: Rhode Island's state primary on Tuesday gave its new voter identification law its most strenuous exercise yet, stirring dissent and praise from voters who lined up with ID cards, but few problems were reported.
abstract: Rhode Island's state primary on Tuesday gave its new voter identification law its most strenuous exercise yet, stirring dissent and praise from voters who lined up with ID cards, but few problems were reported.

headline.main: Rhode Island Primary Tests New Voter ID Law
